'''"Snow on the Hearth"''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Sakura Mochi]] with [[Kamisato Ayaka]]. The recipe for Sakura Mochi can be acquired from Act I of [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s [[Story Quest]]: [[The Whispers of the Crane and the White Rabbit]], [[With You]].

"Snow on the Hearth" revives the selected character and restores '''20%''' of Max HP and an additional '''1,500''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
